title: PBE signups?
body: When are the PBE signups going to be up again? I was accepted before the website crashed and I never got a chance to create my account.

replies.body: The PBE is still down for extended maintenance, but I don't have any ETA on when it will be back up.  Updates will be posted on the[ PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe), though.  Hang tight!
